content.description: A slabby start gives way to easier climbing above the 1st bolt.  Route is slightly run out above the 2nd bolt but good holds lead the way to the chains.
content.protection: 2 bolts plus a 2 bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Route is on West side of boulder, only a few feet North of the obvious dihedral.

content.description: An easy start begins to meander up the wall following hard to see holds.  The holds disappear near the top and reaching the chains is the crux.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a 2 bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: This is the only route on the North side of the boulder, it is almost directly in the center of the wall and climbs just left of the only tree next to the wall.

content.description: Climb the striking arete keeping your right hand and foot on the arete as you move up through the route.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a 2 bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Route is on West side of Boulder on the obvious arete

content.description: Climb the cracks which are littered with plates, jugs, and a few crimps straight to the chains. Beware of loose rock between the 1st and 2nd bolts.
content.location: Located in a small alcove on the southwest side of the Psychedelic Boulder. God's Waiting Room, 5.13 (Jesus Boulder) is directly behind you.

content.description: Secluded, free standing boulder with routes on all 4 sides.  Routes see infrequent traffic and therefore may need a good brushing if you head this way.
